A lot of the time, you tend to be a bit isolated from other people.
Sometimes, that might be because you work and focus best when you're on your own.
However, sometimes it might be because you have difficulty connecting with others.
In general, you're a bit of an introvert, and can get overwhelmed in a group.
This makes you strongly independent and self-sustained...
...but in a time of need, you might find yourself wanting to reach out to those you know.
A lonely person like you will be...
